title: Dungeon Defenders
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  An ancient evil has been unleashed on the land of Etheria and it’s up to you to defend it in this online (and offline) action RPG! Create your own hero from one of four distinct classes to summon towers and traps and fight back hordes of enemies! Customize and level your hero by defeating enemies, looting equipment and upgrading your gear and pets. Take your character through multiple difficulty modes and challenge/survival missions to earn more experience & even better treasure. To top it off, you can do all of this with up to 4 friends on the same console or over Xbox LIVE! With the content of a full retail release and graphics powered by Unreal Engine 3, Dungeon Defenders is one of the true AAA downloadable titles available on Xbox LIVE!

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Dungeon Defenders
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  An ancient evil has been unleashed on the land of Etheria and it’s up to you to defend it in this tower defense co-op action RPG! Create your own hero from one of four distinct classes. Plan your defenses and fight through wave upon wave of enemies in an epic loot fest as you forge equipment, customize & level your character, collect pets and more! Play the trial with up to 4 friends on the same console or over Xbox LIVE! Unlock the full version to continue your character’s progress with more experience, better treasure and access to the full campaign & other mission modes. With the content of a full retail release and graphics powered by Unreal Engine 3, Dungeon Defenders is one of the true AAA downloadable titles available on Xbox LIVE!

childDownloads.title: Mistymire Forest
childDownloads.description: A new campaign and challenge mission that puts you and your fellow heroes on a quest to recover the long-lost fairies from the fog-shrouded bogs of Mistymire. Rare and powerful items await those who can brave the hazards of the forest!

childDownloads.title: The Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards Part 2
childDownloads.description: Now that your Dungeon’s been defended, prepare to venture outside into the realms of Etheria in The Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards! Explore the desert city of Morrago and experience new missions, story cinematics, enemies, and more:  This DLC pack contains: • “The Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards Part 2” Campaign Mission • “War of the Djinn” Challenge Mission • “Oasis” PvP Battleground • Djinn Enemy • Genie King Boss • 10 brand-new themed weapons • 1 brand-new Pet with special abilities  Dungeon Defenders is a tower defense, action-RPG that sets you on an epic adventure to protect the Eternia Crystals! Create heroes from one of four classes to fight across a full campaign or horde of survival/challenge missions! Level your heroes, raise and trade pets, collect loot, forge equipment and more! Play with up to 4 friends via local and online multiplayer!
